ABOUT US

At Western Oregon Botanicals, we provide our clients with superior service, a wide selection of strains, and consistent quality at fair prices. Our company owners are passionate cannabis activists and industry leaders with roots in the Oregon Medical Marijuana Program. As such, we provide medication for a large number of patients, as well as resources and assistance to aid new patients. Now, we have expanded into growing for the recreational market. At the heart of W.O.B. are our large indoor gardens, which allow even our largest crops to be of an uncompromising quality. We utilize state of the art equipment and labor intensive techniques to produce cannabis that we believe is some of the finest in Oregon, boasting incredible terpene profiles, and a subsequently potent aroma and flavor. All W.O.B. cannabis is flushed for 7-12 days, and then cured to perfection, to ensure a clean and potent product.
